sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM019',T1.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE) AS PRT_AT_CODE_NM ,T1.GIS_ASSETS_CD ||' - '|| T1.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD AS GIS_ASSETS_CD ,T1.GIS_ASSETS_NM ,NVL2(T1.GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB,T1.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC||' '||T1.GIS_ASSETS_LNM ||'-'||T1.GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB ,T1.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC ||' '|| T1.GIS_ASSETS_LNM) AS GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC ,T1.GIS_ASSETS_AR ,T1.GIS_ASSETS_REAL_RENT_AR ,T4.MNG_YEAR ||' - '|| T4.MNG_NO ||' - '|| T4.MNG_CNT AS MNG_CD ,T4.ASSETS_USAGE_SEQ ,T4.ENTRPS_NM ,T4.USAGE_AR ,T4.USAGE_PD_FROM ,T4.USAGE_PD_TO ,T4.FEE
,T4.USAGE_PURPS ,T4.USAGE_DTLS ,T4.ENTRPS_SE ,T4.EXEMPT_SE ,T4.EXEMPT_RSN ,T4.EXEMPT_PD_FROM ,T4.EXEMPT_PD_TO ,T4.COMPUT_DTLS ,T4.TRMNAT_DT ,T4.TRMNAT_RSN ,T4.REG_USR ,T4.REGIST_DT ,T4.UPD_USR ,T4.UPDT_DT ,T4.APPLC_PRICE ,T4.OLNLP ,T4.APPLC_TARIFF
FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F T1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT T2.PRT_AT_CODE ,T2.MNG_YEAR ,T2.MNG_NO ,T2.MNG_CNT ,T2.ASSETS_USAGE_SEQ ,GAM_GETENTRPSNM(T3.ENTRPSCD, '1') ENTRPS_NM ,T2.USAGE_AR ,TO_CHAR(T2.USAGE_PD_FROM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS USAGE_PD_FROM ,TO_CHAR(T2.USAGE_PD_TO, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS USAGE_PD_TO ,T2.FEE ,T2.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE ,T2.GIS_ASSETS_CD ,T2.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD
,T2.USAGE_PURPS ,T2.USAGE_DTLS ,T2.ENTRPS_SE ,T2.EXEMPT_SE ,T2.EXEMPT_RSN ,TO_CHAR(T2.EXEMPT_PD_FROM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS EXEMPT_PD_FROM ,TO_CHAR(T2.EXEMPT_PD_TO, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS EXEMPT_PD_TO ,T2.COMPUT_DTLS ,TO_CHAR(T2.TRMNAT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS TRMNAT_DT ,T2.TRMNAT_RSN ,T2.REG_USR ,TO_CHAR(T2.REGIST_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REGIST_DT ,T2.UPD_USR ,TO_CHAR(T2.UPDT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS UPDT_DT ,T2.APPLC_PRICE ,T2.OLNLP ,T2.APPLC_TARIFF
FROM ASSETS_RENT_DETAIL_F T2 INNER JOIN ASSETS_RENT_F T3 ON (T2.PRT_AT_CODE=T3.PRT_AT_CODE AND T2.MNG_YEAR=T3.MNG_YEAR AND T2.MNG_NO=T3.MNG_NO AND T2.MNG_CNT=T3.MNG_CNT) WHERE 1=1
AND T2.USAGE_PD_FROM >= TO_DATE(#sDtFr#,'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND T2.USAGE_PD_TO < TO_DATE(#sDtTo#,'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1
AND T3.ENTRPSCD = #sRegistEntrpsCd#
AND T3.PRMISN_YN='Y' )T4 ON (T1.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE=T4.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND T1.GIS_ASSETS_CD=T4.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND T1.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=T4.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD) WHERE 1=1
AND T1.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #sPrtAtCode#
AND T1.GIS_ASSETS_NM LIKE '%' || #sGisAssetsNm# || '%'
ORDER BY T4.MNG_YEAR, T4.MNG_NO, T4.MNG_CNT ) S ) A
WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) AS DATA_COUNT ,SUM(T4.USAGE_AR) AS SUM_USAGE_AR ,SUM(T4.FEE) AS SUM_FEE FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F T1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT T2.PRT_AT_CODE ,T2.MNG_YEAR ,T2.MNG_NO ,T2.MNG_CNT ,T2.ASSETS_USAGE_SEQ ,GAM_GETENTRPSNM(T3.ENTRPSCD, '1') ENTRPS_NM ,T2.USAGE_AR ,TO_CHAR(T2.USAGE_PD_FROM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS USAGE_PD_FROM ,TO_CHAR(T2.USAGE_PD_TO, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS USAGE_PD_TO ,T2.FEE ,T2.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE ,T2.GIS_ASSETS_CD ,T2.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD FROM ASSETS_RENT_DETAIL_F T2 INNER JOIN ASSETS_RENT_F T3 ON (T2.PRT_AT_CODE=T3.PRT_AT_CODE AND T2.MNG_YEAR=T3.MNG_YEAR AND T2.MNG_NO=T3.MNG_NO AND T2.MNG_CNT=T3.MNG_CNT) WHERE 1=1
AND T2.USAGE_PD_FROM >= TO_DATE(#sDtFr#,'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND T2.USAGE_PD_TO < TO_DATE(#sDtTo#,'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1
AND T3.ENTRPSCD = #sRegistEntrpsCd#
AND T3.PRMISN_YN='Y' )T4 ON (T1.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE=T4.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND T1.GIS_ASSETS_CD=T4.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND T1.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=T4.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD) WHERE 1=1
AND T1.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #sPrtAtCode#
AND T1.GIS_ASSETS_NM LIKE '%' || #sGisAssetsNm# || '%'
